attributes.action: The people reject Parliaments Brexit betrayal agenda and demand we Leave the EU!
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people WILL have our vote respected, we WILL have our democratically decided decision implemented and you WILL listen to the sovereign people - Your employers!
We hereby REJECT wholesale any & all of the following Parliament proposals:
1) Choice of May's deal or Remain.
2) 2nd EU referendum.
3) Cancel Brexit.
4) Delay Brexit.
5) Further votes on May's deal.
6) Any idea of a Brexit compromise (Soft/Hard etc.)

We demand to Leave the EU completely as you were instructed to do in June 2016!
attributes.background:
June 2016+ Leave EU meant-No ECJ jurisdiction, No customs union, No single market, No common fisheries policy etc.. Leave means OUT completely/entirely!
Referendum choice was IN or OUT, Remain or Leave, nothing else!
Simple choice, nothing about IF your MP agrees to it or IF we can deal to remain!
